name: Mushroom Entertainment
overview:
ME is building a worldwide network of independent musicians, labels, managers, fans and other service providers related in the industry. ME apps are interconnected and provides solutions for different aspects of the music business. These applications can be any level of musician, band, label, manager, producers etc.

ME Label takes care of the label aspect of the business. After sign up, users will be able to create releases. Depending on the stage of development, estimated budget entered and the date of release, the system will generate a budget including services such as recording, design, music video etc. Users will be able to monitor the progress of the job and publish the album internationally.

Other products includes ME Fund (Crowd Funding), ME Project (Crowd Sourcing), ME Promotion (Ad & PR Platform). These applications can be used independently or in conjunction with ME Label. We recently launched our consumer end on-demand streaming platform ME Radio (http://meradio.fm)
